'''''Vinyar Tengwar 10''''' is the tenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|9|11}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "''I Ngurth Granthira''" ("The Death of Caranthir") — Tom Loback
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Standard of Eldarin Typography" — Lawrence Schoen
* "''Elenaltalantë'': The Fall of Gil-galad" — trans. Jorge Quiñónez and Jean-Marc Rulier
* "The ''Tengwar'' Text of Lines 3994-4027 of the 'A' Text of '[[The Lay of Leithian]]'" — Donald O'Brien
* "''Essitalmar'': Finduilas, a Fair Name for a Fair Maiden" (column) — Tom Loback
* "Transitions in Translations: Sauron’s Portuguese Cohorts" (column) — Arden R. Smith
